players.name: Patrick Mahomes
clues: His father Pat Mahomes pitched 11 seasons in MLB for six different teams
3-time Super Bowl champion, though lost Super Bowl LIX 40-22 to the Eagles
Currently sidelined with a knee injury, replaced by Gardner Minshew
Selected 10th overall in 2017 out of Texas Tech, traded up by the Chiefs
Quarterback for the Kansas City Chiefs, seeking to bounce back in 2025
Wears #15, known as 'Showtime' for his no-look passes

players.name: Josh Allen
clues: Grew up on a cotton farm in Firebaugh, California, population 8,000
Won the 2024 NFL MVP award, beating out Lamar Jackson
Signed a record 6-year, $330 million extension with $250 million guaranteed
Selected 7th overall in 2018 out of Wyoming
Quarterback for the Buffalo Bills, still seeking his first Super Bowl
Wears #17, famous for hurdling defenders

players.name: Lamar Jackson
clues: Won the Heisman Trophy at Louisville in 2016, becoming the youngest winner at 19
2-time NFL MVP, finished second to Josh Allen in 2024 voting
First player in history to throw for 4,000 yards and rush for 800 in a season
Selected 32nd overall in 2018, the final pick of the first round
Quarterback for the Baltimore Ravens, all-time leader in QB rushing yards
Wears #8, nicknamed 'Action Jackson'

players.name: Ja'Marr Chase
clues: Sat out the 2020 college season to prepare for the NFL Draft
Won the 2024 receiving triple crown - most receptions, yards, and TDs
Signed a $161 million extension, highest-paid non-QB in NFL history

Wide receiver for the Cincinnati Bengals, 4-time Pro Bowler
